subject: Invoice for Shop
body:
Please Note:

This is a remailing of a single invoice. If there are discrepencies between this and the previous emails, this email can be seen as up-to-date. These previous mailings happend on:

August 24, 2022 : 11:54pm
August 25, 2022 : 12:05am
September 14, 2022 : 8:48pm

Hello Frank Thomas,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Shop): for a total of $45.00. The work took place between Jul 25, 2022 and Jul 26, 2022.

Specific Note

Remail Comment

Hey Mrs. Thomas. I re-issued this invoice to be made out to Frank instead of TGC.



Details


Shop: 1 invoice totaling $45.00


Invoice #4 for $45.00
Days Worked
Jul 25, 2022 2hr 0min,
Jul 26, 2022 1hr 0min


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $0.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Construction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.

Contact Information

Telephone: 336-406-1319
Email: ggoadmusic@gmail.com
